title: Azrah Traders Women's Lambskin Leather Moto Biker Jacket - Winter Wear
features: PERSONALISED SIZE: Are you tired of unusual fitting, return and refund? We, at AZRAH, provide you option to send us size and get the jacket as per your wish. Also, we have a standard size in Images and size chart. Kindly choose wisely.

HANDMADE LEATHER JACKET: Azrah Trader delivers only the highest quality products to meet your requirements. Our 100% leather jackets are super-soft, protects from extreme cold and are extraordinarily comfortable.
HEMMED ROUND COLLAR: Designed with full sleeves and deep neck collar, the leather allows the material to easily stretch and form to your body for ultimate style and comfort.

ALWAYS in FASHION: Get the sleek and simple design with only 2 side pockets without any zipper to place your hand and feel the warmth. We use original Ykk chain for the smooth experience for years and years.
GIFT IDEA for HER: Choose the winter gift for your girl-friend, Sister or any lady you like to impress on the occasion of Birthday, Women's day, Christmas day or New year.
description: High-Quality Women Leather Jacket - Extremely Warm
The " Leather Lovers " is known for its leather quality. The jackets are crafted by professional artisans so that it must be slim fit, stylish and comfortable to wear.
The color may differ slightly due to photography lights or different screen resolution setting. The solid color you get from us will not fade easily and built to last for years.
Best Gift for her: Its soft touch makes it the best choice as a gift on the occasion of Birthday Day, Mother's Day, Christmas Gift and Anniversary.
Maintainance Tips: Clean leather jacket with little liquid cleaner using soft cotton cloth. Do not wash with water or direct sunlight exposure may damage color.
